headline: Software Developer at Signiant

company.description: Used by the world’s top content creators and distributors, Signiant’s software facilitates the intelligent movement of content across media-aware networks.  Signiant optimizes existing enterprise network infrastructure and integrates with media technology workflows to ensure fast, secure digital media deliveries – and provides easy-to-use interfaces for everyone in the organization.  Headquartered in Burlington, MA, with offices around the world, today Signiant connects tens of thousands of media professionals in more than 50 countries. For more information, visit www.signiant.com.
company.name: Signiant

company.description:
Fuel is a Global Youth Engagement company.
Across Youth Agency and Entertainment categories we captivate Generation Play with deep, digital brand experiences.

Fuel Youth

Generation Play accesses more media with more control than any other audience. With higher expectations, a desire to be entertained and the ability to circumvent advertising on television and web, they represent a new type of consumer that is a product of both gaming and the Internet.

For more than 10 years, Fuel has pushed the limits of branded entertainment in digital media, capturing audiences' attention with engagement, rather than pushy messages. Through communications platforms that provide outlets for creativity, moments of sharable delight, and most importantly - play - we have grown into one of the most advanced youth marketing firms in the world.

Fuel Entertainment

Beginning with vibrant characters and engaging storylines, Fuel creates entertainment properties for today's emerging audiences that spark imagination wherever viewers go. As new generations aspire to a new approach to entertainment, Fuel reaches youth audiences seamlessly across both traditional and new platforms.

With animated and live action television, gaming and digital experiences; Fuel Entertainment brings stories to life in engaging and innovative ways.
company.name: Fuel Industries

values.summary:
At Fuel Industries I have been placed in numerous roles in various projects.
I specialize in leading all phases web application development. From front-end Javascript and HTML; to back-end server-side development in PHP, Java and DotNet; to database design and deployment.
values.title: Software Developer

company.description: Xandros is a leading provider of Linux-based server, desktop and Windows-Linux cross-platform systems management tools. Xandros' mission is to help businesses lower costs of IT infrastructure through revolutionary design and workflow-driven management tools. The company's products empower Windows-centric businesses to benefit from the flexibility, reliability and security of Linux and open source, without requiring Linux expertise. Xandros was founded in 2001, and is headquartered in New York, with offices in Ottawa, Frankfurt and Sao Paulo.
company.name: Xandros Corporation

company.description: N-able Technologies is the global leader in remote monitoring and management solutions and services for managed service providers (MSPs) and IT departments. N-able's award-winning N-central software and complementary toolsets are proven to reduce IT support costs, improve network performance and increase productivity through the proactive monitoring, management and optimization of IP-enabled devices and IT infrastructure. N-able maintains operations in North America, the U.K., the Netherlands and Australia.
company.name: N-able Technologies

values: Managed Security, Endpoint and Anti spam

values.summary:
N-able Technologies is the global leader in network and systems management solutions and services for managed service providers (MSPs) and IT professionals.
            I worked as part of the UI development team designing the front end web application.
          
    Projects:
    * Designer and Developer working on key features of N-able's
      N-central Remote Monitoring and Management Platform, both J2EE and
      PHP versions.
    * Designer and Developer working on key features of N-able's
      OnDemand Remote Monitoring and Management Platform.
    * Designer and Developer working on third party software integration
      with N-able's N-central Platform.
    
    Achievements:
    * Designed and Developed key features of a large scale J2EE web
      application based on the Jakarta STRUTS framework and utilizing
      SOAP and WSDL technology.
    * Wrote Functional Specifications, Design Documents, and Test Plans.
    * Chaired and attended software design meetings.
    * Designed and Developed key features of a large scale PHP web
      application.
    * Debugged code as part of a maintenance team.
    * Performed performance testing and tuning.
    * Excelled in a fast-paced, dynamic environment working for a
      start-up company.
values.title: Intermediate Software Developer

values.summary:
I worked as part of the Business Services Unit to develop and maintain large-scale PeopleSoft databases.
          
    Achievements:
    * Maintained highly complex Oracle databases.
    * Designed queries to ensure database integrity and efficiency.
    * Worked within all stages of the software development lifecycle.
    * Developed web-based intranet application in ColdFusion to help
      track outstanding maintenance requests.
values.title: Database Analyst

values.summary:
I developed applications for the Quality Assurance department in an automobile parts manufacturing plant.
          
    Achievements:
    * Designed and administered databases in Access for data storage and
      organization.
    * Designed custom applications to interface with storing,
      retrieving, and analyzing of data.
    * Spearheaded and worked independently on numerous projects with the
      overall goal of improving data collection and analysis efficiency
      in the Quality Assurance Department.
values.title: Application and Database Developer

values.summary:
I developed data entry tools for border agents in the field.
          
    Achievements:
    * Designed and built an automated database for capturing data in
      Access.
    * Created macros in Access to simplify common procedures.
    * Helped design user-friendly data-entry spreadsheets in Excel using
      VBA.
    * Worked well within a small group and communicated with people
      across the country.
values.title: Database Designer

company.description:
Environment Canada's mandate is to preserve and enhance the quality of the natural environment; conserve Canada's renewable resources; conserve and protect Canada's water resources; forecast weather and environmental change; enforce rules relating to boundary waters; and coordinate environmental policies and programs for the federal government.

The Department employs about 6000 people and has an annual budget of over half a billion dollars. Over two-thirds of this budget and more than half of the Department's work force is dedicated to science and technology.

Environment Canada’s national headquarters are located in Gatineau, Quebec. It has offices in some 100 communities across the country.

address.street1: Les Terrasses de la Chaudière, North Bldg

company.name: Environment Canada

values: •Preserve and enhance the quality of the natural environment, including water, air, soil, flora and fauna

values.summary: I developed and maintained the Water Services Department government website.
values.title: Web Developer

values.description:
I was the technical development lead for the re-launch of Barbie.com for Mattel.
I lead a team of 6 developers and worked directly with the client to deliver a modern web experience which featured
* Gamification system with integration to BunchBall
* Large-scale content management system with integration to SDL Tridion
* Responsive web design
* RESTful platform for 3rd-party integrations
* Deployment to Amazon Web Service and built-to-scale for hundreds of thousands of unique visitors per day
values.name: Barbie.com

values.description:
Share Barney Hugs was a project conceived for HIT Entertainment to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Barney by sharing 25 million hugs via social media.
I was the Lead Developer on the project and delivered the end-to-end solution including:
- HTML/CSS/Javascript webapp integrating with Vimeo API to give an interactive video experience, and JSONP services to connect to back-end servers.
- Back-end servers written in PHP and MySQL that managed hug counting and served up near real-time updated count numbers.
- Integration with Facebook OpenGraph API, Twitter, and MailJet mail service.
- Deployment on Amazon Web Services, including: EC2, RDS, S3, and CloudFront
- Web Application builds using Grunt
values.name: Share Barney Hugs

values.description:
I worked on developing an level editor for McDonald's children MMO.
The level editor was built using:
* DotNet MVC web services serving JSON
* JavaScript front-end built using the KnockoutJS framework, dynamic SVG graphics and JSON- based AJAX data bindings.
values.name: McDonald's Happy Studio

values.description:
I was the technical lead and developer for Google Think B4U, an interactive digital literacy project produced for Google. I developed and oversaw other developers on the project that was implemented with the following technologies:
* Java-based Google AppEngine cloud-based server
* JavaScript-based front-end web application
* HTML5 and CSS3 web technologies including: HTML5 Video,  HTML5 Audio, CSS3 Transitions, LocalStorage
values.name: Google Think B4U

values.description:
I was the lead server developer for SparkCity World, an online MMO for girls. In this role I developed on, and oversaw development of:
* Java-based multiplayer socket server using SmartFox Server framework
* PHP and Apache based web server
* Build and Deployment systems using a variety of tools such as BuildBot, Ruby Migrations, Capistrano, Ant
* Database design and maintenance in MySQL
* Unit testing and Code coverage using JUnit, PHPUnit, Mockito, Cobertura
values.name: Spark City World

values.recommendationText:
Peter is an excellent developer, a strong leader, a fun person, and overall a well-rounded individual. He demonstrates amazing attention to detail, as such has become the go-to person for everything from program specifications to task breakdowns, management of other developers, and is a natural mentor.

Peter demonstrates strong dedication to his craft, is a masterful programmer, and has consistently gone above and beyond the call of duty. There isn't a single challenge I haven't been able to trust him with and I am proud to have the opportunity to work with him.

summary: A lead position within a Software Development team, with opportunities to design and develop interesting and challenging software projects.
